title: Minecraft我的世界玩服务器推荐MOD- TukMC
txt_content:
详细介绍：本文
玩过山口山的玩家应该都熟悉界面自定义哈。事实上，本MOD的作者的灵感来自魔兽世界的界面自定义，然后把他用到我的世界上来。游戏中截图




你可以调整你想要显示的信息，比如连接到服务器的玩家数量，服务器时间，周围有怪的会提示，你的FPS，你的工具，武器等的耐久度..
默认设置按键
K键 -打开“控制面板”
Delete键 -显示物品信息。部分设置汉化截图：




更新日志：
1.0 – Initial release after Vazkii’s discontinuation
1.1 – Adds ability to disable clock and compass at top
1.2 – Fixed config menu to work on any resolution
- changed wither affect on health bar & removed health integer when player has the wither effect
1.3 – Re-added tinyUrl support (Big thanks to Vazkii for the libs)
1.4 – Fixed glitch where IC2 support wasn’t correctly referencing ( le me derp )
1.5 – Fixed glitch where custom rendered items were not rendering (CC turtles, BC pipes, etc)
- Fixed sidebars overlapping hotbar
1.6 – Added config option to re-enable default status bars (health, armor, xp, air)
1.7 – Fixes XP level not rendering when default status bars on
- Fixes save location, now will save in a relative location
1.8 – Fixes IC2 glitch
- Fixes position of XP level when using default status hud
1.9 – Addition of color configuration menu (open config, look in top left)
- Some small bugfixes, I think it fixes the unconfirmed bug where you couldn’t disable notifications.
2.0 – Update to Minecraft 1.5
2.1 – Fixes a derp on my part (I screwed up buttons)
2.2 – Fixes changes to Forge’s texture engine, should fix wrong font textures showing up.
- Super sneaky addition for anyone who is going to be decompiling this mod, you might find something new 
2.3 – Trying to fix texture stuff still 
2.4 – Polished off the last of the texture errors
- Slick new configuration menu, it has pages!
2.5 – Misc. fixes, including scoreboard
2.6 – Update to forge 7.7.1.x
2.7 – Fixes chatbutton issues, minor bugfixes
2.8 – Block at pointer display
- Enchanted items show glint in top bar
- Fix CC turtles not showing in hotbar *AGAIN*— — 求人气 金币
